name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Search by date - horizontal bar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Always show the date selection in a horizontal menu. Adds 6 months, 2 years & 5 years and custom search ranges.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update April 10 2024: The extension has been updated and works again.

- Always visible date/time selection menu
- One click for each option
- Adds 6 months, 2 years & 5 years buttons
- Easier to access custom range
- Shows shortened amount of results
- Shows full results count & search speed in tooltip
- Lag / CLS free
